text.p: Recall the augmented matrix from the last problem:

Working from right to left as in the last video, what are all possible solutions to this system? Type the word ‘free' (lower-case) if the variable is a free variable. For others, remember to use * for times and type xn for the variable [mathjaxinline]x_ n[/mathjaxinline]. For instance, to enter [mathjaxinline]-3x_2 + 2x_4[/mathjaxinline], type -3*x2 + 2*x4.

font.p: Working from right to left, we first see that there is not a pivot in the column corresponding the [mathjaxinline]x_4[/mathjaxinline]. Thus, [mathjaxinline]x_4[/mathjaxinline] is free. We then see a pivot in the column corresponding to [mathjaxinline]x_3[/mathjaxinline], and corresponding equaion is [mathjaxinline]0x_1+0x_2+1x_3+3x_4=3[/mathjaxinline]. This gives [mathjaxinline]x_3=3-3x_4[/mathjaxinline]. Next, there is not a pivot in the column corresponding to [mathjaxinline]x_2[/mathjaxinline], and thus [mathjaxinline]x_2[/mathjaxinline] is free. Finally, there is a pivot in the column corrsponding to [mathjaxinline]x_1[/mathjaxinline] and the corresponding equation is [mathjaxinline]1x_1+0x_2+0x_3+1x_4=-2[/mathjaxinline]. This gives [mathjaxinline]x_1=-2-x_4[/mathjaxinline].
